# airbyte_source_smartengage (Resource)

SourceSmartengage Resource

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "airbyte_source_smartengage" "my_source_smartengage" {
  configuration = {
    api_key     = "...my_api_key..."
    source_type = "smartengage"
  }
  name         = "Guillermo Kunze"
  secret_id    = "...my_secret_id..."
  workspace_id = "d4319439-8c78-43c9-a398-ed3d3ab7ca3c"
}
```

## Schema

### Required

- `configuration` (Attributes) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--configuration))
- `name` (String)
- `workspace_id` (String)

### Optional

- `secret_id` (String) Optional secretID obtained through the public API OAuth redirect flow.

### Read-Only

- `source_id` (String)
- `source_type` (String)

<a id="nestedatt--configuration"></a>
### Nested Schema for `configuration`

Required:

- `api_key` (String) API Key
- `source_type` (String) must be one of ["smartengage"]
